body: I remember that EnergyPlus 7.2 started to introduce the feature for running a single simulation in parallel which they removed once EnergyPlus came out. I'm not sure if they ever put it back. For running a group of idf files in parallel check [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/running-several-e-simulations-at-a-time?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1388833&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987). You can set the number of CPUs there. [](http://api.ning.com/files/4bIsJDjFjL7ZVkSw62wlUtMQOHf2vVm3XXMLhe3hGV6wtVwnZ3hpHf06YUXXmMQpJhtsRUs8qqL-egQDkIpm4J6wom3ZU42e/runMultipleIdfFiles.png)
